item.title: Vinod Khosla on AI, moonshots, and building enduring startups — all at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Vinod Khosla, founder of Khosla Ventures, takes the Disrupt Stage for a candid fireside chat on AI, climate, healthcare, and transformational startups...

item.title: Tim Chen has quietly become of one the most sought-after solo investors
item.description: Tim Chen, solo VC at his firm Essence VC, just closed his fourth fund, a fresh $41 million, without even trying.

item.title: AI company Superpanel raises $5.3M seed to automate legal intake
item.description: Superpanel announced Tuesday a seed $5.3 million raise in a round co-led by Outlander VC and Field Ventures.
